name: firstRemoteVideoFrame
description:
Occurs when the first remote video frame is rendered.
The SDK triggers this callback when the first local video frame is displayed/rendered on the local video view.  The application can retrieve the time elapsed (the elapsed parameter) from a user joining the channel until the first video frame is displayed.

parameters.uid: The user ID of the remote user sending the video stream.

parameters.width: The width (px) of the video stream.

parameters.height: The height (px) of the video stream.

parameters.elapsed: Time elapsed (ms) from the local user calling joinChannel until the SDK triggers this callback.
